text: 13 acre lot with rural Setting & Landscape Desert high-land terrain with flat to gently rolling ground and sparse native vegetation - sagebrush, creosote, and desert grasses. Expansive mountain and desert views toward surrounding ranges, giving a wide, open-sky feel with sunrises and sunsets over distant peaks.Peaceful & Quiet Lifestyle *Far from urban centers, these parcels offer privacy and serene desert living - no HOA or city ordinance overreach unless specific overlays apply. *The wide spacing of neighbors means less noise, less traffic, and a true rural feel. Access via dirt or county-maintained roads. Zoned Agricultural-Residential allowing a broad range of uses including: *Residential use - site-built homes, manufactured homes, modular, or tiny homes allowed. *Livestock & agriculture - horses, goats, cattle, sheep, chickens, and similar animals are typically permitted when the property is A-R or RU. *RVs & trailers may be allowed temporarily; permanent RV living often requires a septic or permit. *Outbuildings, barns, corrals, fenced pastures - common for ranch or homestead setups. **Note: Specific allowances (like number of animal units, structure setbacks, or business uses) depend on the parcel's exact zoning designation, which is best confirmed through the county zoning office. Utilities & Off-Grid Potential *No municipal utilities - properties of this kind are typically off-grid unless a buyer extends power/water infrastructure. *Electricity usually comes from solar, generators, or alternative systems. *Water is normally via a private well (permit required from the Arizona Dept. of Water Resources) or hauled water until a well is established. **Septic system needed for any permanent dwelling.

text: With RV parking on both sides, a a highly sought-after 4-car garage, and a private pool and spa, this Granite Bluffs home offers a lifestyle few properties can match. Experience breathtaking mountain views from this spacious off-grid home, set on 4.55 acres of tranquil and private land, conveniently located just minutes from town and essential amenities. The 1,680 sq ft manufactured home, built in 2023, features 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and is in excellent condition. The seller has made several upgrades, including a full-length covered deck/patio and three mini-split heating and cooling units in the dining room, bedroom, and living room. Inside, you'll find stylish fixtures and neutral decor throughout. The well-appointed kitchen and master bedroom, which includes a large walk-in closet, enhance the home's appeal. The other three bedrooms are situated on the opposite end, offering a split floor plan for added privacy. Outside, enjoy a back covered patio a perfect spot for sipping lemonade while taking in the stunning Arizona skies. The property comes equipped with an owned 6,000 kWh solar system with batteries, plus a second solar system that powers the tool shed and chicken run shed. It features a 5,000-gallon water tank, a trailer with a water tank and pump, and a generator with a maximum output of 13,000 watts, providing 8,000 watts of steady power during outages. Additionally, there are three sheds on the property: one with a metal barbed wire chicken run, one functioning as the battery shed, and the third serving as a tool shed. The first solar system consists of 24 panels rated at 250 watts each, totaling 6,000 kWh, and includes a SolArk 12,000 kWh capacity charge controller with four internal DC to AC inverters, as well as eight LifePower EG4 48-volt, 100 amp-hour batteries with a 48-volt bus bar connection. The second solar system includes 10 panels at 250 watts each, providing 2,500 kWh with a charge controller and a 12-volt DC to AC inverter powering eight 12-volt, 100 amp-hour batteries. The property also has four 25-gallon propane tanks for additional utilities.

text: Welcome to an unbelievable opportunity on 40 acres of peaceful, wide-open land. This property sits on a hill with views that stretch for miles, surrounded by Juniper trees and some of the darkest, clearest night skies you will experience. Access is easy, and the property is just a short drive off Hackberry Road. Every detail, both for now and the future, has been carefully planned. The main home was completed in 2024 and offers 1,256 square feet of thoughtful design. The kitchen stands out with a large pantry, soft-close cabinetry, under-cabinet lighting, and granite countertops. The laundry area includes a utility sink and a circulating pump added to the water heater for instant hot water. The primary bedroom feels like a retreat with large windows that frame the sweeping views. Sliding glass doors lead to the covered patio, where you can enjoy quiet mornings and peaceful evenings. A 220 outlet is in place for a future spa. The new, never-lived-in Casita features 527 square feet with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and an attached garage with climate-controlled storage at the back. Designed with mobility in mind, it also reflects the same beautiful build quality as the main home. It includes 2 covered patios, a kitchen with dark cabinetry, granite countertops, and a large bathroom with a walk-in shower. Both the home and casita have spray foam insulation to help keep utility bills lower. The private well produces about 100 gallons per minute and includes a 1 1/2 horsepower pump, 2,500 gallons of water storage, a fully insulated pump house, and a whole-house filtration system. There are also two large, fully fenced animal containment areas that give your dogs a great place to run. The property was designed to take full advantage of the scenery and plan ahead for future needs. Below the home is a rough-graded pad ready for a future shop or horse setup. There is an RV clean out with water and electric, wiring in place for Starlink, and underground electrical conduit already run and marked for upcoming projects. The panel has space for future additions. If you just cannot get enough of the outdoors, there is even a seasonal toilet that lets you enjoy the fresh air and starry skies. If you are looking for the ideal homestead in a higher elevation with complete privacy and panoramic views, this one is hard to beat. This is a property you truly need to see to appreciate.

Crown molding. 4 recessed lighting under eves around entire exterior of home. 11 security cameras. 2-16 seer 4-ton gas pack units.
